name: playwright-js-bdd-tests

scripts.test:chromium:smoke: BROWSER='chromium' npx cucumber-js format:allure --require support/world.js --require steps --tags '@smoke'
scripts.test:chromium:regression: BROWSER='chromium' npx cucumber-js format:allure --require support/world.js --require steps --tags '@regression'
scripts.test:firefox:tags: BROWSER='firefox' npx cucumber-js format:allure --require support/world.js --require steps --tags
scripts.test:firefox:smoke: BROWSER='firefox' npx cucumber-js format:allure --require support/world.js --require steps --tags '@smoke'
scripts.test:firefox:regression: BROWSER='firefox' npx cucumber-js format:allure --require support/world.js --require steps --tags '@regression'
scripts.test:webkit:tags: BROWSER='webkit' npx cucumber-js format:allure --require support/world.js --require steps --tags
scripts.test:webkit:smoke: BROWSER='webkit' npx cucumber-js format:allure --require support/world.js --require steps --tags '@smoke'
scripts.test:webkit:regression: BROWSER='webkit' npx cucumber-js format:allure --require support/world.js ---require steps -tags '@regression'
scripts.test:crossbrowser:smoke: HEADLESS=false npm-run-all remove-allure -p test:chromium:smoke test:firefox:smoke test:webkit:smoke

scripts.docker-remove-all: npm run docker-remove-images && npm run docker-remove-containers && npm run docker-compose-down
scripts.docker-compose-run-tests-args: OPEN_ALLURE=false BROWSER=chromium HEADLESS=false TAG='@sign-in' npm run docker-compose-run-tests
